subject: Re: Website Updates
preview: Closing ticket while waiting for client's response.

full_threads.body: Closing ticket while waiting for client's response.

Hi Steven,

Happy Monday! Hope you are well.

Just checking in to see if you might be available later this week for a quick chat to go over your questions around:

  1. the Calendly setup
  2. redesign costs

📅Book your preferred time here

Looking forward to hearing from you very soon.

Hi Steven,

Just checking in to see if you might be available today for a quick chat to go over your questions around:

  1. the Calendly setup
  2. redesign costs

📅Book your preferred time here

Looking forward to your response very soon.

Hi Steven,

Hope you’re having a lovely week so far.

Apologies for the delayed reply—there have been quite a few moving parts on our end recently.

I’d love to catch up and go over your questions together. Would you mind checking if you're available at the suggested date and time below?

📅Book your preferred time here

Looking forward to speaking with you very soon.

Hi Joy,
I want to talk about calendly aspect, and redesign costs.
Steven Reinhardt
Director/Principal Audiometrist

www.earstoyou.com.au
0409600278

Hi Steven,

Hope you are doing well!

Happy to discuss the quote further.

Can you confirm what points you'd like to discuss or any specifics so we can check on it ahead?

Looking forward to your response very soon.

Hi Joy,
Are you able to arrange a zoom meeting with me to discuss this quote further?
Steven Reinhardt
Director/Principal Audiometrist

www.earstoyou.com.au
0409600278

Hi Steve,

Hope you are having a lovely Friday!

Thank you so much for your patience while we double-checked things with our team.

Here’s the updated quote for the tasks related to earstoyou.com.au and northsideaudiology.com.au included with your current plan:

👉Estimated quote for tasks

When you have a moment, feel free to review and let us know if you're happy for us to go ahead.

Always happy to help if you have any questions!

Updated and feedback below:
1. Keep it high level (use 2 instead of 1-2)
2. Hourly rate is $149 for everything
3. Reduce clutter

@andy Can you check this quote for earstoyou.com.au & northsideaudiology.com.au?
Context: They wanted to include the plans in the quote.

👉Estimated quote for tasks

Let me know your thoughts. 🙏

Hi Steve,

Hope you are having a lovely Monday!

We are looking into sending the updated quote to you this week.

Also, regarding the spam you’ve been receiving—we’ve already forwarded this to our team for investigation.

We’ll make sure to keep you posted with any updates.

Thanks @allieB

Both earstoyou.com.au and northsideaudiology.com.au are on Lite Plans, which include 15 minutes/month of support time per site. This is meant for small updates or quick fixes.

For anything beyond that (like what’s been scoped here), our rate is $109 per hour.

Given the nature of the work (new form builds, payment integration, booking tool setup, imagery updates, etc.), these tasks definitely fall under custom dev. The included 15 minutes wouldn’t be enough to cover them.

@joy can estimate # of hrs priced @ $109/hr and then @andy can confirm before we share to the client.

hey @daphne - they want to know their cost/ maybe we can give them a quote as well

  • earstoyou.com.au - covers 15 minutes
  • northsideaudiology.com.au - covers 15 minutes

Due to lite plans

Hi Joy,
Can I get a quote separated out ie - cost for NSA & Cost for ETY.
With our included plans, can this role out be done within that scope?

On a more urgent note, we are getting spammed through northside audiology on our lyric landing page. Please can you action a fix for this asap - noting we have received in excess of 200 spam messages
Steven Reinhardt
Director/Principal Audiometrist

www.earstoyou.com.au
0409600278

Hi Steven,

Hope you are having a lovely day!

Sorry for the slight delay in getting these over to you. Here are our estimated hours for each task—we appreciate your patience!

[Priority] earstoyou.com.au [Total = 3-4h]
  1. New Form [1-2h]
  • Duplicate Nursing Home Hearing Assessment form.
  • Use the URL /aged-care-assessment
  • Add a $175 fee to "Existing Hearing Aid Service - a quote will be provided prior to any service" same function with Ear Wax Removal with Payment integration.
  1. helpingears.org [2h]
  • Add a new main menu item: “helpingears.org”
  • Add one slide each to the Homepage and About Us page featuring helpingears.org
    • Focus on hearing aid recycling and community involvement
  1. Update Hearing Aids imagery [1h]
  • Can refer to phonak.com, oticon.com.au
  • AI-generated images are fine, as long as they look modern and relevant

northsideaudiology.com.au [Total = 5-7h]
  1. Implement an online booking tool like Calendly [2-3h]
    • Must integrate directly with Outlook calendar (real-time sync with patient bookings)
  1. Explore improved menu font options [1h]
  2. Update website imagery (again, phonak.com and oticon.com.au as references) [2-3h]
    • AI-generated visuals are okay if they appear current

Note that for the Calendly integration, we will need you to create an account here, then provide us access so we can configure it on the website.

Let us know your thoughts and if you are happy for us to proceed with the updates.

Hi Team Wolf,
Following up on this to see estimation of time frames and integration?
Steven Reinhardt
Director/Principal Audiometrist

www.earstoyou.com.au
0409600278
(Time: 30mins) Google meet call+tasks check

Hi Steven,

Hope you are having a wonderful Friday!

Yes, we confirm that earstoyou.com.au is hosted with us.

I’ve also shared your requested updates with the team, and we should be able to get back to you early next week with an estimate of the hours needed to complete the tasks.

Let us know if there’s anything else you need in the meantime—always happy to help.

That looks correct to me, noting that ears to you has hosting with Wolf IQ as well.
Steven Reinhardt

Hi Steven,

Thanks again for taking the time to share your vision for earstoyou.com.au and northsideaudiology.com.au—really appreciate the clarity and thought you brought to our chat.

Here’s a quick summary of what we’ve captured. Please take a look and confirm everything looks good on your end, so we can pass this along to the team and provide an estimate of the hours required:

[Priority] earstoyou.com.au
  1. New Form
  • Duplicate Nursing Home Hearing Assessment form.
  • Use the URL /aged-care-assessment
  • Add a $175 fee to "Existing Hearing Aid Service - a quote will be provided prior to any service" same function with Ear Wax Removal with Payment integration.
  1. helpingears.org
  • Add a new main menu item: “helpingears.org”
  • Add one slide each to the Homepage and About Us page featuring helpingears.org
    • Focus on hearing aid recycling and community involvement
  1. Update Hearing Aids imagery
  • Can refer to phonak.com, oticon.com.au
  • AI-generated images are fine, as long as they look modern and relevant

northsideaudiology.com.au
  1. Implement an online booking tool like Calendly
    • Must integrate directly with Outlook calendar (real-time sync with patient bookings)
  1. Explore improved menu font options
  2. Update website imagery (again, phonak.com and oticon.com.au as references)
    • AI-generated visuals are okay if they appear current

Also, just a quick recap of your current plans with us:
earstoyou.com.au
  • Lite Plan [Yearly]
northsideaudiology.com.au
  • Lite Plan [Yearly]
  • Domain Name Reg [Yearly]
Lite Plans include the following:
  • 15 mins/month of support
  • Core updates and quick fixes
  • Secure (SSL) WordPress hosting
  • Weekly automated backups
  • 24/7 uptime monitoring
  • Detailed monthly reporting

Looking forward to hearing your thoughts very soon.
